text: can you believe it tilly our first
halloween in big city my hypothesis is
that our evening will be delicious i'm
gonna eat so much candy i'm gonna throw
up that way i'll have room for even more
candy
ooh like the costume tilly what are you
a mad scientist oh no i'm just a regular
scientist if i'm angered at all it is
due to a lack of funding for my research
hey kids i just finished locking up the
animals and gave grandma her many
medications which means it's time for
trick-or-treating
actually dad we've got some good news we
don't need you for halloween this year
what are you talking about back in the
country houses were few and far between
he had to drive us around just so we
could trick-or-treat we drive for miles
and still hardly get any candy but here
in the city homes are all squished
together we're gonna get ten times more
candy than we ever did in the country
so now your services are completely
unnecessary it's not great papa me and
tilly can finally trick-or-treat by
ourselves but i always take you
trick-or-treating can't we just shh
your years of halloween service will not
be forgotten
but tilly you got the bucket of fake
blood fake hmm
beware the blood moon oh grandma not
this again yes this again y'all stay
inside tonight what's happening tilly
grandma's starting to lose it i'm
warning you both a blood moon on
halloween night is a powerful thing
after tonight
our family may never be the same
stay back
oh it's just a coffee made from next
door hey i have a life outside of work
you know wait is that a club
yes
whatever just tell cricket he left this
abomination in the cafe when i see him
again i am gonna
happy halloween gloria uh gloria look
what you've done boy now we got a buddy
in our hands
hi gloria you ready brother does candy
taste sweet yes big city halloween
awaits timber
look kids your dad's a lumberjack since
grandma's all worried about tonight i
figured i'd throw on a costume and come
along as your chaperone oh or way ahead
of you dad remy's coming and he's
bringing his bodyguard vasquez
hey guys master remy allow me to assist
you no thank you i can get down on my
master no don't help
whoa you look pretty mad for a hot dog i
am mad did you see vasquez he asked me
weeks ago when i was dressing up as for
halloween and sure enough on halloween
night he shows up wearing the same thing
vasquez stole my idea remy i hear you i
see you but there's no time to worry
about costume theft we gotta go have the
greatest night of our lives
huh
whoa
what the
what's wrong with the animals i will
admit their behavior is strange
[Applause]
very strange
oh i get it y'all trying to scare us huh
well you should leave that to the
professional
demon pig demon pig
god my butter replies
cynthia what's happening to y'all
oh laughs finds a way
not good guys this is not good kids
hurry get inside
we can't
[Applause]
don't worry children i am your shield
what the heck was that that is a
halloween blood moon i've never seen one
myself but i've heard grizzly tales from
times past entire farms have been undone
by its wicked curse families torn apart
well hold on we're safe as long as we
stay inside the house i'm sure the blood
moon will fade in a few hours and
everything will be back to normal a few
hours i can't wait that long
trick-or-treating will be over isn't
there anything we can do nothing now
bill should have pinned up the animals
beforehand but i did they must have
broken out
huh welcome back
bye
